name: MYCP:HTTP and C++ Web Application Server
short_description: MYCP is a Boost based, open-source, cross-platform HTTP and C++ web application server. MYCP make C++ and web development more simple,make development efficiency increases 20 times, code decreases 80%. CSP+ include CSP,CDBC,C++ Servlet,C++ APP,RCA...
